person.persName: John Alexander Adair (Green County, Kentucky, druggist and soldier.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, druggist and soldier. Green County, Kentucky, native. Son of Alexander Adair and Elizabeth W. Monroe Adair. Married to Mary Bird Stockton. Father of Kate Adair and William Adair. Resident of Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Druggist in Green County in 1860. Served in the 4th Kentucky Mounted Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a captain and lieutenant colonel from September 14, 1861, to August 31, 1863. Wounded at the Battle of Shiloh, Hardin County, Tennessee, on April 6, 1862. Resigned on account of disability.
